document.full_text: american international group inc's  chartis unit will transfer the bulk of its asbestos liabilities to berkshire hathaway inc's  national indemnity co, aig said on wednesday.
document.title: aig shifts asbestos claims to berkshire unit
lines_and_colors: american international group inc's  chartis unit will transfer the bulk of its asbestos liabilities to berkshire hathaway inc's  national indemnity co, aig said on wednesday.
